name: 20th Century
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, then double strain into coupe. No garnish.

ingredientsList.name: Marie Brizard White Creme De Cacao

ingredients:
1.5 Ounce Beefeater London Dry Gin
.75 Ounce Marie Brizard White Creme De Cacao
.75 Ounce Cocchi Americano
.75 Ounce Lemon Juice

name: Airmail
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except the champagne) with ice, then strain into a flute. No garnish.
ingredients:
1 Ounce Ron Del Barrilito 3-Star Rum
.5 Ounce Lime Juice
.5 Ounce Acacia Honey Syrup
  Dry Champagne

name: Aviation
instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the cherry.
ingredients:
2 Ounce Plymouth Gin
.5 Ounce Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
.5 Teaspoon Creme Yvette
.75 Ounce Lemon Juice
.25 Ounce Simple Syrup
1  Brandied Cherry

name: Bamboo
instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.
ingredients:
1.5 Ounce Dolin Blanc Vermouth
1.5 Ounce Barbadillo Principe Amontillado Sherry
.5 Teaspoon Cane Sugar Syrup
1 Dash Angostura Bitters
1 Dash House Orange Bitters
1  Lemon Twist

name: Bee's Knees
instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the cherry.
ingredients:
2 Ounce Tanqueray London Dry Gin
.75 Ounce Lemon Juice
.75 Ounce Acacia Honey Syrup
3 Drop Scrappy's Lavender Bitters
1  Brandied Cherry

name: Blood and Sand
instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the cherry.
ingredients:
1 Ounce Springbank 10-Year Scotch
.5 Ounce Cherry Heering
.5 Ounce House Sweet Vermouth
.75 Ounce Orange Juice
.5 Teaspoon Lemon Juice
1  Brandied Cherry

name: Bobby Burns
instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a martini glass. Garnish with the lemon twist.
ingredients:
2 Ounce Springbank 10-Year Scotch
.75 Ounce House Sweet Vermouth
.25 Ounce Drambuie
1 Dash Angostura Bitters
1  Lemon Twist

name: Boulevardier
instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the lemon twist.
ingredients:
1.5 Ounce Elijah Craig 12-Year Bourbon
.75 Ounce House Sweet Vermouth
.75 Ounce Campari
1  Lemon Twist

name: Brooklyn
instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.
ingredients:
2 Ounce Rittenhouse 100 Rye
.75 Ounce Dolin Dry Vermouth
.25 Ounce Amaro Ciociaro
1 Teaspoon Luxardo Maraschino Cherry Liqueur

name: Brown Derby
instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the grapefruit twist.
ingredients:
2 Ounce Elijah Craig 12-Year Bourbon
1 Ounce Grapefruit Juice
1 Teaspoon Lemon Juice
.5 Ounce Acacia Honey Syrup
1  Grapefruit Twist

name: Caipirinha
instructions: In a shaker, muddle the lime with the simple syrup and sugar cube. Add the cachaca and shake with ice, then dump into a double rocks glass. No garnish.
ingredients:
6  Lime wedges
.75 Ounce Simple Syrup
1  White Sugar Cube
2 Ounce Avua Amburana Cachaca

name: Champs-Élysées
instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the lemon twist.
ingredients:
2 Ounce Pierre Ferrand Ambre Cognac
.5 Ounce Green Chartreuse
.75 Ounce Lemon Juice
.5 Ounce Cane Sugar Syrup
1 Dash Angostura Bitters
1  Lemon Twist

name: Charleston Cocktail
instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.
ingredients:
.5 Ounce Anchor Junipero Gin
.5 Ounce Massenez Kirsch Vieux Cherry Brandy
.5 Ounce Dolin Dry Vermouth
.5 Ounce Punt e Mes
.5 Ounce Gabriel Boudier Curacao
.5 Ounce Maraska Maraschino Liqueur

name: Cobra's Fang
instructions: Short shake all the ingredients with 3 ice cubes, then strain into a tiki mug filled with crushed ice. Garnish with the mint sprig and lime wheel and serve with a straw.

ingredientsList.name: Massenez Creme De Peche Peach Liqueur

ingredients:
1.5 Ounce Appleton Estate Reserve Rum
.75 Ounce El Dorado 151 Rum
1 Teaspoon Massenez Creme De Peche Peach Liqueur
2 Dash Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe
.75 Ounce Lime Juice
.5 Ounce Orange Juice
.5 Ounce Passion Fruit Syrup
.5 Ounce Cinnamon Bark Syrup
1 Teaspoon Ginger Syrup
1 Dash Angostura Bitters
1  Mint Sprig
1  Lime Wheel

name: Corpse Reviver #2
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.
ingredients:
.75 Ounce Beefeater London Dry Gin
.75 Ounce Cointreau
.75 Ounce Lillet Blanc
2 Dash Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe
.75 Ounce Lemon Juice

name: Daiquiri
instructions: Shake all the ingredients with ice, then strain into a coupe. Garnish with the lime wedge.

ingredientsList.name: Flor De Cana Extra-Dry White Rum

ingredients:
2 Ounce Flor De Cana Extra-Dry White Rum
1 Ounce Lime Juice
.5 Ounce Cane Sugar Syrup
1  Lime Wedge

name: Dark and Stormy
instructions: In a shaker, combine all the ingredients (except the club soda) and whip (shake with a few pieces of crushed ice just until the ingredients are incorporated). Strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Top with club soda. Garnish with the lime wheel and the candied ginger flag and serve with a straw.
ingredients:
2 Ounce Goslings Black Seal Rum
.75 Ounce Lime Juice
.5 Ounce Ginger Syrup
  Club Soda
1  Lime Wheel
1  Candied Ginger Flag

name: Diamondback
instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass.
ingredients:
2 Ounce Rittenhouse 100 Rye
.5 Ounce Laird's Bonded Apple Brandy
.5 Ounce Yellow Chartreuse

name: Fancy-Free
instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, the strain into a double rocks glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with the orange twist.
ingredients:
2 Ounce Rittenhouse 100 Rye
.5 Ounce Luxardo Maraschino Cherry Liqueur
1 Dash Angostura Bitters
1 Dash House Orange Bitters
1  Orange Twist

name: Anjou Mama
instructions: In a shaker, muddle the pear slices. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice, then strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with the lemon wheel.
ingredients:
3  Small Ripe Anjou Pear Slices
1 Ounce Pennyroyal-Infused Hayman's Old Tom Gin
1 Ounce Tanqueray No. Ten Gin
.75 Ounce Lemon Juice
.25 Ounce Orgeat
.25 Ounce Cinnamon Bark Syrup
.25 Ounce Acacia Honey Syrup
1  Lemon Wheel

name: Mexi-Gin Martini
instructions: Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a coupe. No garnish.
ingredients:
2 Ounce Plymouth Gin
.5 Ounce Dolin Dry Vermouth
.25 Ounce Del Maguey Crema De Mezcal
.25 Ounce Jalepeno-Infused Siembra Azul Blanco Tequila
.25 Ounce Green Chartreuse
1 Dash Bitter Truth Celery Bitters

name: Cinder
instructions: Rim a coupe with smoked salt. Shake the remaining ingredients with ice, then strain into the coupe. No garnish.
ingredients:
Smoked Salt
.75 Ounce Pueblo Viejo Reposado Tequila
.75 Ounce Jalepeno-Infused Siembra Azul Blanco Tequila
.5 Ounce Del Maguey Vida Mezcal
.75 Ounce Lime Juice
.75 Ounce Simple Syrup
2 Dash Angostura Bitters
